column1: #Text=Första Maj i Frankrike: sex poliser skadade efter våldsamma anti-rasist dåd.
#Text='About 150 people armed with molotov cocktails and stones invade event, with France divided over presidential election'.

#Text='Six riot police officers were injured, one with third-degree burns to his hand and face, in Paris when a group of about 150 people armed with molotov cocktails, stones and sticks hijacked the traditional May Day march organised by French unions.'.
#Text='Even before the violence, the march had got off on the wrong foot.

#Text=Unable to agree on how best to confront the prospect of Le Pen becoming the countrys next president - by voting blank, abstaining or choosing Emmanuel Macron : the unions went their separate ways, with two organising a breakaway gathering in north Paris on Monday morning.'.
#Text=Fick Le Pen 10% mer röster pga denna incident?.
